targets.target: alias(movingAverage( divideSeries( dnsdist.$dnsdist.main.cache-misses, sumSeries( dnsdist.$dnsdist.main.cache-misses, dnsdist.$dnsdist.main.cache-hits ) ) , $smoothing), 'cache miss rate (%)')

rows.title: Timeouts, errors and cache miss rate
